name: Scream machine - Writer
description:
This is quest like game about procrastination and isolation.

This is my first Game Jam game. Unreal Engine is more convinient to me for the moment. Keep in mind that you need graphic card supported directX 11 ( any modern discreed card). I didn't test it on different system, so sorry if something will goes wrong. It is draft of game for sure so don't be too dissapointed.
